general.requiredFields: The fields marked with an asterisk are mandatory.

login.loggedInText: You can now register for events or update your profile.
login.notLoggedIn: You are not currently logged in.
login.notLoggedInText: If you want to register for an event or update your profile, please log in first.
login.loggedInInstructions: Now that you are authenticated, you can do all of these things:
login.bookmarkSite: Save the page in your bookmarks, to come back here easily
login.cookie_warning: We use cookie to log you in automatically with the code that was sent in your registration email. By clicking the checkbox above, you accept the use of cookies on this website.
login.howToDescription: The easiest way to log in is to click on the link in the registration email. After clicking it, you will be brought back on this page and be automatically logged in.
login.notifyError: There was an error, please check your information.

members.create: Create the profile of a new member
members.update: Edit the profile of an existing member
members.alreadyLoggedIn: This member has logged in before.
members.neverLoggedIn: This member has never logged in.
members.notifyFailure: There was a problem. Please check the informations entered.
members.title: Member list
members.confirmDelete: Do you really want to remove this member?

multiselect.selectGroupLabel: Press enter to select the group
multiselect.deselectGroupLabel: Press enter to deselect the group

events.title: Upcoming events
events.name: Name of the practice
events.nameDescription: Give the practice a name (example: weekly practice at Brébeuf)
events.notify_error: There was a problem. Please check the informations entered.
events.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this practice?
events.locationDescription: Location of the training (exemple: Collège Brébeuf)
events.descriptionDescription:
Add a description to the event, for example:
- What we will practice
- A special event
events.noteLocation: The position on the map will only be saved if a location is specified in the associated textbox.
